name: The Basement (Zenshi)
description:
It's a short adventure rpg maker vx ace game. It's based on a creepypasta, The basement by MJ0rz. Hope you enjoy.

First of all, it's the first game I made in my life.  I had a few attempts but none of them worked. If you have any suggestions I'd be happy to read them. I have a few things that I would change in the next project, if it comes to life.
